personalInfo.education: University of Arkansas at Little Rock (2011, Psychology)

tourBios.curYrHigh: Playing on an invite he finished T51 at the Alfred Dunhill Championship, the opening event of the European Tour 2016 season in South Africa in November, 2015.
tourBios.carHigh:
2015: Had top-5s on his first two starts on PGA TOUR Latinoamérica, where he played five other events and finished the season ranked 55th on the Order of Merit… Finished T4 at the Lexus Panama Classic, an event he led for the first 61 holes. Entered the final round holding a four-stroke lead, but a triple-bogey on No. 8 and a double on No. 9 got him out of contention… Finished T3 three weeks later at the Guatemala Stella Artois Open, an event he led after an opening round of 66 that included a hole-in-one on No. 8 at La Reunión Resort. Shot 70-70 the next two rounds to finish five strokes behind the champion of the rain-shortened event… Went home to Sweden in June to finish T76 at the European Tour's Nordea Masters, his only cut made in two ET starts… Missed the cut in two starts on the Web.com Tour… Finished T18 at the ATB Financial Open in his only start on PGA TOUR Canada.

2014: Earned conditional PGA TOUR Canada status at the Florida Qualifying School...Bookended rounds of 65 to finish T8 at the ATB Financial Classic for first career top-10 finish... Finished T87 at Web.com Tour Q-School in December, playing just a few days after his mother's death.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Played college golf at the University of Arkansas at Little Rock. Two-time Academic All-American and a three-time member of the Sun Belt all-conference team.
tourBios.personal: Worked in his family's bakery after graduating from college… His mother, Barbro, was diagnosed with skin cancer in 2012 and passed away in December of 2014. Says that she loved him playing golf and that she serves as his inspiration on the golf course… Dream foursome would include Tiger Woods, Bill Gates and Albert Einstein… Carries a special Swedish flag headcover… Favorite course is the Alotian Club, and his favorite professional team is the New England Patriots… Would like to trade places with Tom Brady because he wants to play in the NFL… Bucket list includes driving a Formula 1 car, visiting New York City and playing with Woods and winning… Favorite vacation spot is Phucket, Thailand, and his favorite entertainer is Bruce Springsteen… Favorite book is The Big Miss, and he loves "any food deep fried."… Twitter and Instagram names are @LinusGillgren

tourBios.exmtStatus: Conditional - Additional Qualifying Tournament Finisher or Finished 76-100 on 2014 Web.com Tour Money List

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the PGA TOUR Latinoameri in 2016 is T13th at the Guatemala Stella Artois Open.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks T69th in Par Breakers on the Latinoamérica.
